## readIndex2 variable

Inline function. Returns vec2 (x,y components) at index `i` in `tex`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
readIndex2: (tex: Sampler2DTerm, i: IntTerm, size: IVec2Term) => import("@thi.ng/shader-ast").Swizzle<"vec2">
```
